title: Web Developer
introduction: I create intuitive web experiences and digital solutions where usability, performance, and efficient workflows go hand in hand. The result is scalable, user-friendly products built with a strong business focus.

paragraphs: I’m Steffen Svenningsen, a Web Developer with a professional bachelor’s degree in web development. I work across both frontend and backend, building websites and web applications that are scalable, maintainable, and built to perform.

My experience includes frontend development with frameworks like Vue, backend development using Laravel, and delivering complete solutions from initial setup to long-term optimization. I also work extensively with SEO — both technical and on-page — ensuring that products are fast, discoverable, and built on a solid technical foundation.

I’m particularly motivated by helping small businesses optimize and digitalize their workflows. I enjoy building web apps that replace manual processes, save time and money, and create practical, measurable business value. My approach is always focused on performance, usability, and cost-effective solutions that scale with the business.
Outside of work, I’m a former elite football player and stay active through running, football, and tennis.
